backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining data models and state for profiles, episodes, characters, clans, gallery items, news, scripts, pro blocks, and fan mail, including storage and access-control mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old gallery item structures into the extended new format with added metadata fields and default values.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature requests, affected files, components, and associated tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing various frontend files, components, hooks, and configuration behavior.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, themes, and core styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML root document loading the React application entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app managing hash-based routing between main, admin, and pro views and rendering all major sections accordingly.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Admin gate component handling authentication, admin checks, and routing to either login prompts, unauthorized messages, or the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Provides the main admin dashboard UI with navigation tabs for managing site content and routes to various admin panels.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Cha: Implements character management including listing, creating, editing, deleting, and metadata encoding/decoding.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Cla: Handles CRUD operations for clans with metadata encoding and a dialog-based form.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Epi: Manages episodes with CRUD, reordering, file upload handling, character tagging, and visibility settings.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Fan: Displays fan mail messages, supports viewing and replying, and sorts messages by newest first.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Gal: Admin panel for creating, editing, and deleting gallery items with image upload, metadata handling, and tag selection.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/New: Admin interface for managing news posts, supporting creation, editing, deletion, and basic validation.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Scr: Panel for managing script entries with create, update, and delete functionality and permission-aware error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Tea: Admin tool for listing team members and granting or revoking user roles with permission checks.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with status handling and automatic retry on auth conflicts.
frontend/src/components/characters/Chara: UI component displaying a character card with clan-based styling, portrait handling, and motion-aware animations.
frontend/src/components/characters/Creat: Dialog form for creating a character, handling validation, metadata encoding, and mutation submission.
Displays a small styled badge for a clan with animated accent effects.
frontend/src/components/clans/ClanCard.t: Animated card showing clan details, sigil, badge, and description with motion‑aware effects.
frontend/src/components/episodes/Episode: Card displaying episode metadata and optional watch button, styled by release status.
Dialog for viewing an episode with video playback or an unavailable notice.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryG: Grid of gallery items with category filtering and interactive hover previews.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryL: Lightbox dialog for viewing gallery images with navigation and keyboard controls.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryU: Dialog for uploading gallery images with drag‑and‑drop, metadata fields, and create mutation.
frontend/src/components/news/NewPostForm: Form component for creating a news post with validation and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsPostCar: Displays a news post with formatted timestamp, author, title, and content.
Gatekeeper component that renders children only for authenticated admin users.
frontend/src/components/pro/proPresentat: Encodes and decodes Pro presentation blocks to and from JSON with validation.
frontend/src/components/pro/ProPresentat: Loads, displays, and optionally edits Pro presentation blocks with scroll animations.
frontend/src/components/pro/proPresentat: Zustand store managing Pro presentation blocks and basic CRUD operations.
Type definitions for Pro presentation blocks and documents.
frontend/src/components/pro/ProToolbar.t: Floating toolbar for adding blocks and saving Pro presentation changes.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Animated About section showcasing story features with icons and scroll reveal effects.
frontend/src/components/sections/Charact: Fetches, transforms, and displays character cards with admin creation controls.
frontend/src/components/sections/ClansSe: Displays a clans section that loads clan data, falls back to static data, and renders ClanCards with scroll-based animations and a world map.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Renders the contact section with a fan mail form, contact info, and scroll-triggered animations.
frontend/src/components/sections/Donatio: Shows donation tiers and descriptions with animated visuals and a styled background.
frontend/src/components/sections/Episode: Fetches and displays episodes with loading/error states, supports watching released episodes, and opens an episode player dialog.
frontend/src/components/sections/FanMail: Provides a fan mail form with validation, success/error handling, and submission via a mutation hook.
Renders the footer with branding, navigation links, social icons, and scroll-triggered animation.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Renders the gallery with filters, sorting, admin uploads, and lightbox functionality using backend queries and metadata decoding.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeaderN: Provides a responsive navigation bar with smooth scrolling, admin access, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Displays the animated hero section with parallax background, particle effects, and title content respecting motion preferences.
frontend/src/components/sections/NewsUpd: Shows news posts, login handling, admin post creation, and user profile setup with modal support.
frontend/src/components/sections/WorldMa: Renders interactive SVG hotspots for the world map, managing refs and keyboard accessibility for location selection.
Displays a dialog containing lore details for a selected map location with close controls.
React section component showing the world map with animated reveal, hotspot interactions, and a lore dialog.
frontend/src/data/characters.ts: Defines character types and a list of detailed character profiles with clan, personality, powers, and roles.
frontend/src/data/clans.ts: Defines clan metadata including descriptions, colors, and sigil asset paths.
frontend/src/data/episodes.ts: Defines the Episode type and a list of Season 1 episodes with titles, summaries, and release status.
frontend/src/data/gallery.ts: Defines gallery item structure, provides an empty items array, and lists available gallery categories.
frontend/src/data/worldMapLocations.ts: Defines world map location data with coordinates, lore text, clan association, and SVG hotspot shapes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context and provider handling login, identity storage, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: React hook applying scroll-based parallax transforms with reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Hook detecting the user's prefers‑reduced‑motion media setting and updates on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user data, roles, episodes, and other backend entities.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealOnScroll.ts: Hook that reveals an element when it enters the viewport using IntersectionObserver with reduced‑motion fallback.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and utility styles with custom color variables and anime‑themed glow animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point mounting the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
Utilities to encode and decode metadata in content fields for clans, characters, episodes, and gallery items.
frontend/src/utils/galleryImageUpload.ts: Image upload validator converting files to data URLs with type and size checks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended OKLCH-based color system, custom radii, shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, goals, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features for the anime-themed website and admin system.
